title: The Triple Package (2014) epub - Amy Chua
description:
The Triple Package: How Three Unlikely Traits Explain the Rise and Fall of Cultural Groups in America




 Why do some groups rise? Drawing on groundbreaking original research and startling statistics, The Triple Package uncovers the secret to their success. A superiority complex, insecurity, impulse controlÃ¢â‚¬â€these are the elements of the Triple Package, the rare and potent cultural constellation that drives disproportionate group success. The Triple Package is open to anyone. America itself was once a Triple Package culture. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been losing that edge for a long time now. Even as headlines proclaim the death of upward mobility in America, the truth is that the oldfashioned American Dream is very much aliveÃ¢â‚¬â€butsome groups have a cultural edge, which enables them to take advantage of opportunity far more than others.

 if they donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t say so aloud) that theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re exceptional, chosen, superior in some way.

 people tend to feel insecure, inadequate, that they have to prove themselves.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ America today spreads a message of immediate gratification, living for the moment. But all of AmericaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most successful groups cultivate heightened discipline and impulse control.
